pathAssistantSteps.info: The Research Office seeks approvals from authorised approver/s. Once approved, the Research Office updates the status in the Researcher Portal and moves the proposal to the next stage.

Researcher completes the Project Proposal record including Details, adds Team Members, creates Budget, attaches relevant proposal documents, CVs and draft agreements under Documents and Agreements tab, adds Research Codes (FOR, SEO and TOA) and Research Centre details. When the draft is complete, click Submit to Research Office (top-right of screen).


Tip: Use the Chatter to ask ask questions or share updates.

The Research Office reviews the eligibility of the project team to apply for this funding opportunity based on the scheme-specific criterion before the proposal is submitted for Head of School validation. If additional information is required at this stage, the Research Office Contact listed on the record will contact the Lead Chief Investigator listed on the project.
The funder is reviewing the submitted proposal.
The proposal is successful and is now a project.
